duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver Fire Protection Engineering subject matter expertise to DoD federal government, Military, and Intelligence Community partners.
Create and evaluate design analyses, conceptual designs, program requirements, calculations, equipment selection and layout, and system selection and layout for various fire protection systems.
Collaborate in a design team environment, working together with engineers, designers, and project managers.
Take ownership of small projects or portions of larger projects.
Interface with mission partners, clients, and Authorities Having Jurisdiction (AHJ) to prepare, validate, and deliver key design efforts.
Receive mentorship from Mid-Level and Senior Professionals to grow and expand career.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Fire Protection Engineering (ABET accredited)
Engineer-in-training (EIT) or NICET Level 3 and above
